org.fcrepo.kernel.utils

Class JcrRdfTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.utils.JcrRdfTools

  • public class JcrRdfTools
extends Object
    A set of helpful tools for converting JCR properties to RDF
    Author:
    Chris Beer

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      A map of JCR namespaces to Fedora's RDF namespaces

      • getJcrNamespaceForRDFNamespace

        public static String getJcrNamespaceForRDFNamespace(String rdfNamespaceUri)
        Convert a Fedora RDF Namespace into its JCR equivalent
        Parameters:
        rdfNamespaceUri - a namespace from an RDF document
        Returns:
        the JCR namespace, or the RDF namespace if no matching JCR namespace is found

      • getRDFNamespaceForJcrNamespace

        public static String getRDFNamespaceForJcrNamespace(String jcrNamespaceUri)
        Convert a JCR namespace into an RDF namespace fit for downstream consumption.
        Parameters:
        jcrNamespaceUri - a namespace from the JCR NamespaceRegistry
        Returns:
        an RDF namespace for downstream consumption.
